name: Hamster Club
summary: A training simulation game that raises hamsters and aims to become a breeder master. Select one of the three animals, "Shigecchi", "Boo-chan", and "Endo-kun", and raise and breed them based on the funds you have. If you participate in various competitions (cups), you will compete for the hamster's ability and cuteness. Up to 4 hamsters can be kept in one cage at the same time. Of course, it is compatible with communication cables and can print cute hamsters.
